entries.meaning: (Australia, Britain, New Zealand) A sequence of letters and numbers added to a postal address to aid the sorting and delivery of post or mail.
(by extension) The region denoted by a postcode.

verbs.description: postcode (third-person singular simple present postcodes, present participle postcoding, simple past and past participle postcoded)

entries.meaning: (UK) To give a postcode to; to mark with a postcode.
